transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Good morning sir, Ritika this side from IndiaMART. Sir, aapki taraf se bhi customer care pe call aaya tha.
Customer: Sir, mam, main aapko kitni baar call kiya, aap phone hi nahi uthate.
Executive: Sir, I'm sorry, maine pata nahi mere paas kuch phone mein issue tha, pata nahi call mere ko show nahi ho rahi thi. Bataiye sir, kya issue aa raha tha?
Customer: Oh, mera jo number update kiya hai maine, lekin woh director sahab ko ja raha hai call ispe. Main number batata hu aapko.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: United Tyre aap se bol raha hu main.
Executive: Main samajh gayi sir. Mujhe ye bhi pata hai ki aapko sirf number vgera change karna hai, hai na?
Customer: Number change kiya tha, lekin mujhe call nahi aa raha hai. Customer ka call nahi aata hai, woh director sahab ko ja raha hai.
Executive: Ek second rukiye. Sir, aapke jo do primary number hai, pehle main ek baar matlab ye clear kar deti hu. Yaha par abhi filhaal do number mere ko show ho rahe hai. Ek toh first number toh 89 se start hai, last mein 641 hai, jispe shayad aapke aur meri baat ho rahi hai.
Customer: Haan, yahi number hai mera, haan.
Executive: Okay, ek number hai 77 se start hai, last mein 744 hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aur ek aur number dala hua hai, 69 se start hai, last mein 240 hai.
Customer: 240, nahi 401 hoga.
Executive: Uh, nahi sir, main dobara se ek baar check karke batati hu. Sir, 69 se start hai, last mein 240 hai.
Customer: 240, 240, ek minute haan.
Executive: Bilkul sir, call pe rahiye. 240 hai kya number? Verification number.
Customer: 401 na?
Executive: Mam, lekin ek 401, main ek number leta hu, us pe call ja raha hai IndiaMART ka, dekhiye ek baar.
Executive: Abhi ek second sir, main apna account open kar rahi hu, ek second.
Executive: Sir, haan, aapka ye number dale hue hai do, jo maine abhi aapko bataye. Aur ek aur number yaha pe dala hua hai, 77 se start hai, last mein 679 hai.
Customer: 679?
Executive: Ji, chaar number on hai aapke isme.
Customer: Nahi mam, woh wohi do teen number hai jo koi bhi. Lekin ye number, main aapko ek number batata hu, us pe call ja raha hai IndiaMART ka.
Executive: Bataiye.
Customer: 97300
Executive: 97
Customer: 70
Executive: 97 ka toh koi number nahi dala hua sir yaha pe.
Customer: Yahi toh baat kar raha hu main, unko kyu call ja raha hai phir?
Executive: Sir, kisi client ne directly call toh nahi kiya?
Customer: Nahi nahi, woh IndiaMART se call kiya sir, main keh raha hu unko. Maine abhi unse baat kiya.
Executive: Ek kaam kar lijiye. Aap hai na ek baar apne account login karke usko logout karke dobara se login kar lijiye.
Executive: Kyunki main jitna check kar pa rahi hu sir, matlab is samay bhi, abhi aapka account maine off open hi kiya hua hai. Toh jaise ki ek number wohi jis par hum baat kar rahe hai, 89 last mein 641 primary number, woh aapka PNS mein maujud hai. Dusra number aapka 77 se start hai, last mein 744 hai, alternate number.
Executive: Woh aapka PNS mein sorted hai. Iske alawa ek 77 se start hai, last mein 679 hai. Ye aapka on hai aur iske alawa jo maine aapko bataya, I think ye landline number hai, 69 se start hai, last mein 240 hai.
Executive: Ye chaar hi number hai aapke.
Customer: One minute, main isko sign out karta hu ek baar.
Executive: Haan, kariye.

Customer: Abhi phir se seller.indiamart pe jau kya, IndiaMART seller pe?
Executive: Sir, aap phone par hai ya phir system pe hai?
Customer: System pe hu main.
Executive: System pe hai? Theek hai, toh aapne login kar rakha hai, right hand side pe dekhiye aapka naam likha hua aa raha hoga. Hi Vijay.
Customer: Haan, hi bolke aa raha hai.
Executive: Usme last mein aa raha hai sign out.
Customer: Sign out kiya maine abhi.
Executive: Theek hai, aap dobara se daliye seller.indiamart.com.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Uspe jayenge, aapka number mangega, number daliye apna primary number. Us par OTP aayega, woh OTP daliye.
Customer: [inaudible] Wi-Fi chala nahi kya hai yaha pe?

Customer: Mam, mera main personal personal number se call karta hu aapko.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Yahi number hai na?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's calls are being routed to director.

- Wants to resolve the call routing issue.



Resolution:

- Executive verified the registered numbers.

- Asked to log out and log in again.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will log in again.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- call routing, profile, pns, login
